title: NanoBrook Omni (나노입도분석기)

content: 정적광산란(Static Light Scattering) 동적광산란(Dynamic Light Scattering)
tableItems:
Beam Focus and Steering

Includes mounts, adjustments, and apertures

Turntable

200 mm O.D. turntable, worm gear, and ball bearnings; manual or automatic selection of angles in 0.01° steps; precision machine base with mounting holes; positioning table with micrometer adjustments (power supply and controller for stepping motor is optional)

Specimen Cell Assembly

Including thermal enclosure, centering adjustments, seperate plumbing for temperature control and index matching liquids, round cell holders, square cell holder and alignment cell

Index Matching Vat

With optically flat and specially polished entrance window, precision machined and annealed to minimize stray light

Periscopic Beam Stop

Located inside vat to prevent flare from exit window; provided with coupling for use with optional, zero-angle reference detector

Main Detector Optics

· Entrance aperture 3 mm

· Coated, adjustable achromat for focusing scattered light onto 200 micron slit; slit position adjustable

· Reflex mirrow and high quality eye piece for viewing scattering region through slit

· Filter turret with 637, 532, 633, 514 and 488nm narrow band pass filters and100, 200, and 400 micron, 1, 2, and 3 mm pinhole for SLS & DLS measurements.
title: BI-200SM / Dynamic and Static Light Scattering System (Goniometer)

tableItems:
Size Range

RH 0.5 nm to 3 µm, sample dependent

Cell Volume

2.5 µL

Concentration Range

0.1 to 100 mg/mL, sample dependent

Measurement Precision

1% typically, depending on concentration and the size distribution

Laser

Variable up to 35 mW, 638 nm, & temp. stabilized w/precision power cntr.

Scattering Angle

90°

Detector

Custom avalanche photodiode, APD

Temperature Range

5°C to 90°C

Computer Interface

USB 2.0 & 1.1

Correlator

Brookhaven's TurboCorr, multi-τ, research grade with 512 channels, covering the equivalent of 107 linearly-spaced channel layout, 100% efficiency, real-time operation over the entire delay-time range

Fittings

HPLC Inlet/Outlet on front panel; two sets: batch and flow modes.

Pressure Range

Up to 200 bar (2,940 psi)

Analog Inputs

4 standard. Suitable for use with most common RI and UV outputs

Weight

5.8 kg

Dimensions

180 x 210 x 380 mm (HWD)

Power Requirements

100/115/220/240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 45 Watts max

Environmental Characteristics

Temperature: 10°C to 75°C, Humidity: noncondensing.

Measurement Modes

Software selectable
title: NanoDLS / Particle Size Analyzer for Flow & Batch Mode (크로마토그래피 검출기)

tableItems:
Analysis

Size range of 0.01 to 30 µm maximum; 0.05 to 10 µm typical for low density particles, 0.01 to 2 µm for high density particles; wide variety of materials dispersed in water and other solvents

Data System

Windows computer with printer. Real time graphics and data display, high resolution color (SVGA). Menu driven data analysis and management system, with single copy license and software distribution copy.

Drive System

Microprocessor controlled digitally driven electronic motor. Digital readout for setting and montoring speed. Speed ocntinously variable from 500 to 15,000 rpm. Speed accuracy and stability better than + 0.01%. Temperature sensor and digital readout. Dual purpose integral strobe.

Disc Cavity

Polymethylmethacrylate with stainless steel hub. Dynamically balanced over range of roatational speeds. Spin fluid volume from 10 to 40 mL.

Power Requirements

100/115 VAC, 220/240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 1,000 Watts

Dimensions

260 x 500 x 550 mm (HWD)

Weight

33 kg

Certifications

CE Marked

content: ■ Positive Displacement Pipette 용도와 같은 점성이 있는 물질의 Pipetting용
■ Touch Screen Display & Control : 쉬운 조작 및 작업 진행 사항 확인 편리
■ 전동식 Automatic Tip Ejection 기능으로 작업자의 피로를 감소 (Eject Icon)
■ Brand PD Tip II Size 자가 인식가능이 있어 빠르고 편리한 작업이 가능함
■ 1 ul ~ 50 ml사이에서 어느 Volume도 조절하여 사용 가능함
■ 분주 속도의 조절이 가능하며, 모든 Setting과 작동상태가 모두 Display되어짐
- Auto-dispensing : 첫 3회 분주속도를 자동으로 감지, 평균속도로 계속적인 분주를 진행시키는 기능
- Pipetting : Setting Volume의 반복적인 흡입 및 분주
■ Handystep® Touch S 기능 : Handystep® Touch 기능 + Sequential Dispensing, Multi-Aspiration & Titration
■ 다른 많은 제조사의 Tip과도 호환하여 사용할 수 있음
■ Inductive Charging Stand로 자동 충전이 이루어짐
■ 구성 : Handystep® Touch or Touch S, Conformity Certified, With Serial Number, Performance Certificate, 3 PD-Tip (0.1 ml, 1 ml, 10 ml), NiMH Battery, Charging Dock

title: Digital Peristaltic Pump (정량 이송 펌프)

content: ■ 탄성이 있는 튜브를 사용, Roller를 회전 시킴으로서 일정량의 액체를
■ 액체의 이송량은 튜빙 사이즈와 모터의 rpm에 의해 결정됨
■ 유지 보수가 필요없는 고정밀 모터 및 그래픽 인터페이스로 인해 쉬워진 설치 및 작동
■ 그래픽 LCD는 다음 네 가지 작동 모드를 나타냄
- Continuous Run, Timed Dispense, Copy Dispense, Volume Dispense
■ Brushless Motor는 6000 대 1의 턴 다운 비율로 ± 0.1 %의 속도 제어 정확도를 제공
■ Drive DB25 Female 커넥터를 통한 원격 제어(Option)

title: Pump Head for Peristaltic Pump (정량 펌프용 헤드, Masterflex®)

content: ■ 카트리지 없이 여러 채널의 저 맥동용 정량 펌프 혜드
■ 2-, 4-, 또는 8 Channel 헤드를 사용하여 최대 24 Channel 까지 확장 가능
■ 6 Roller Head : 저 맥동(Low-pulsation Flow)용으로 적합함
■ 3 Roller Head : Higher Flow Rate용으로 적합함
■ 2 개 이상의 펌프 헤드를 장착 할 수있는 L/S® 드라이브와 호환됨 (1/10 hp 이상)
■ 사용되는 Tow-stop Tubing은 최적은 Tension을 보장함
■ 재질 : Stainless steel(SS) & Anodized Alumium with SS Rotor
■ Mounting Hardware & Hex key tool 포함
